content: आस्तरण {%<ab>a.</ab>%} Spreading, covering. --णं {@--1@} Spreading, strewing. {@--2@} A bed, layer; कुसुम° a bed of flowers; <ls>Ku. 4. 35</ls>; सकुसुम° strewn with flowers <ls>Ś. 3</ls>; तमालपत्रास्तरणासु रंतुं <ls>R. 6. 64.</ls> {@--3@} A cushion, quilt, bedclothes; गत° without the bedclothes. {@--4@} A rug, carpet. {@--5@} An elephant's housings, painted cloth (thrown on his back). {@--6@} A layer of Kuśa grass spread out at a sacrifice.
